overview: Luminite is a Hardmode ore dropped exclusively by the Moon Lord in stacks of 70–90 ([e=90–110]). It can be used to craft Luminite Bars, which can then be used to craft several end-game items, like the Solar, Nebula, Vortex, and Stardust tools and armor.

Crafting all items (excluding ammunition) requires a total of 317 Luminite Bars (1,268 Luminite; requires defeating the Moon Lord 15–19 / [e=12–15] times). Crafting all items pertaining to one type of Lunar Fragment (i.e., armor, wings, pickaxe, and hamaxe) requires 68 Luminite Bars (204 Luminite) in addition to 85 of the Lunar Fragment; this requires defeating the Moon Lord only 3 / [e=2-3] times.
notes: All items crafted from Luminite produce a faint glow, even with vanity items equipped over them.
tips: Selling Void Monoliths nets 17 Gold Coins 50 Silver Coins (233.33%) more than selling the required Luminite or an equivalent number of Luminite Bars.
title: Luminite
